title: Microsoft Stream: Add or Edit captions and transcript for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive for GCC and GCC-High
description:
You can upload, download, and delete captions in the Web VTT
file format for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive. This will enable you to edit
transcript files generated by Teams live transcript or Stream via downloading
the file, editing in a text or VTT editor, and re-uploading it. The VTT file
will be displayed as captions inside the video player and as a transcript in
the transcript pane next to the video.
